item.description:
Please join us for our regular monthly meetup and learn how we as a group can change one lawn at a time into delightful, food producing landscapes through permablitzing!

Permablitz is a reciprocal group activity that establishes a basic permaculture garden at someones home. It's similar to the old fashioned barn-raising event where people join together for a day and complete a project that may be too much for an individual to handle alone. A wonderful community building, skill sharing event that produces an immediate benefit to all involved.

The loose agenda:
7:30- Meet and greet
7:45- Share potluck meal and discussion and planning for permablitz events
9:30- Wrap up

Please bring:

-A food or beverage to share for a potluck meal
-Ideas on how we can implement permablitz events within the group and beyond
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal who opens the door
item.name: May Monthly Meetup and Permablitz Planning
